112.content:
THIS IS A PAGE THAT I CAN ACESS THROUGH EMAIL WERE I'LL PUT UP UPLOADS FORM SOME OF MY FAV AUTHORS TO READ VIA MY PHONE SINCE I CAN'T ACES THE CITE ON MY PHONE reguallary

"Heheh, what's the matter Naruto? Are you finally chicken of me?" Kiba asked with an amused smirk. The shrunken fox boy could be heard hissing as he began to wriggle around under Kiba's massive foot. "I'm a lot stronger than you!" Naruto screamed from under Kiba's hard sole. "Hahhaha!" Kiba began to laugh outloud again. When his laughter stopped, he looked at his foot again. "Get real, you're 2 inches tall - the perfect size for being someone's snack, getting sat on or getting stepped on! You better obey what I order you, or else..." Kiba smirked as he began to put pressure on Naruto again.

"So? Who told you could stop?! Sniff my foot!!" Kiba boomed from above. The tiny Naruto cursed as he dug his nose into the large sole that was stepping on him and began to sniff like a dog. Kiba tilted his head back and enjoyed the fact that he had a shrunken Naruto beneath his large foot, sniffing it as though his life depended on it... and it actually did. Afer a few minutes, Kiba pressed the arch of his foot down on Naruto harder. Naruto yelped from beneath as the giant sole pressed down harder on his face so there was absolutely no space between his nose and Kiba's sole. Naruto's lips could taste the salty sweat from Kiba's sole as it pressed down even harder on him.

"Lick." Kiba ordered smiling evilly as he began to gently heave his foot around Naruto's small body. "What?! Screw you Kiba!!" Naruto refused as turned his face to the side despite the pressure. "I was hoping you would say that..." Kiba said smugly as he intensified the weight he put on Naruto even more. "Who knew you'd die this way - the great 2 inch tall Naruto Uzumaki getting stepped on by Kiba Inuzuka! Ahhh, it sounds so nice, wouldn't you agree?" Kiba cackled. "Mmmmpphhh, mmmppph!" The only thing Naruto said was muffled as there was virtually no space between his mouth and Kiba's sole for him to speak and be heard. "Last chance, Naruto. Lick my foot!" Kiba thundered above. He waited a few moments, but didn't feel anything beneath his foot.

"So you just won't do it, huh?" Kiba frowned. He expected Naruto to give him the satisfaction of licking his large foot and continuing to torture him, but it seemed the blond fox boy was unwilling to degrade himself to that point. "Well, if you want do it, guess I'll just report to Fifth that I accidentally stepped on you while you were trying to contact me." Kiba shrugged. "MmphMMPHH!!!" Naruto's scream in reply was muffled once again. Just as Kiba was about to let his full weight drop on the defenceless little Naruto, he heard someone knocking on the door and calling his name. "Damn, just when I got to the good part. You stay still and don't move!" Kiba said as he removed his foot off Naruto who was panting and had gotten pasted to the floor almost like a squashed ant. Naruto took a deep breath as he could finally inhale fresh air, as he saw Kiba open the door of his room and walk out.

Kiba opened the door to reveal none other than Shikamaru and a few other chunin behind him. "Good news, we found that bandit we were looking for. We know where he is, and we need you to help us catch him. We have to pursue him as fast as we can, so hurry up. Naruto's life is depending on this!" the smart chunin leader spoke out. "Wh-whaaat? That was fast..." Kiba sighed. Shikamaru raised his eyebrow as he tilted his head. "You're disappointed?" he asked. "Wh-wha? No! No! I-it's just that I still haven't rested..." Kiba said as he rubbed the back of his neck. "I know, but we have no time to lose. We have to get going...NOW." Shikamaru stressed. "Fine, let me just put my sandals on." Kiba said as he half-shut the door.

He quickly entered in his room and narrowed his eyes down at the panting Naruto. "Looks like you got lucky! Not only about your life, but they even found that bandit that got you to this size!" Kiba smiled as he leaned down and picked up a limp Naruto who seemed to have lost consciousness. "Now, you stay put..." Kiba said as he placed Naruto on the table in the room, and then placed a jar on top of him. "I won't take too long, and when I get back things are gonna get fun again..." Kiba snickered as he put his sandals back on and went out.

===============================================

An hour had passed as Naruto began to regain consciousness inside the jar. "Ugh, my body aches..." Naruto rubbed the back of his neck. At that moment, Kiba came back and entered inside the room. "Ah, looks like you're awake!" Kiba smiled as he removed the jar. "Ahhhhh! Kiba, you're a giant! Oh... wait! I got small and... YOU!!!" Naruto hissed as he snapped back into reality. "I was called on a mission and that saved your butt big time. Luckily, I've been thinking about this, and I decided not to crush you...yet." Kiba smirked as he scooped Naruto up into his hand. He decided not to tell Naruto about the bandit being found, or else he'd be motivated to escape even more. "What kind of mission?" Naruto asked. "Well... we had to chase a cat for some lady... and uhh, yeah. Anyway, I'm beat!" Kiba said, as he kicked his sandals off and layed on his bed. "My feet are REALLY sore; there was a lot of chasing!" Kiba smirked. "Guess who's gonna take care of that for me..." Kiba grinned as he placed Naruto down at the end of the bed, infront of his feet. Kiba wiggled his toes and crossed his feet with the right one above the left one. Naruto's eyes bulged as he looked at the gigantic sweaty soles. He pinched his nose as a strong stench assaulted him. "Make a few shadow clones." Kiba said as he comfortably laid on his bed. Naruto seemed a bit reluctant, but complied with Kiba's demand. He made the handsign, and four clones of himself appeared. Kiba laughed as all five Narutos pinched their noses. "Smells bad, doesn't it?" Kiba laughed.

"S-so, what do you want?" the real Naruto asked as he looked up at the towering Kiba. "I want all five of you to massage my tired feet now, or I'll crush ya under 'em!" Kiba ordered as he looked down at the five tiny Narutos at his large feet.
112.title: WARNING

1121.content:
Naruto looked at his four clones and then back at Kibaâs large, sweaty feet. His pride told him to refuse and attack the feet with his clones, but his mind told him that was the worst thing he could do. It was only a foot massage, so Naruto decided to obeyâ¦for now.

âAlright, guys, come on.â Naruto ordered his clones as he approached the monstrous feet. The shadow clones looked less than pleased to be used for such a purpose, but knew they had no choice. Kiba watched with delight-filled eyes as the five tiny Narutos got to work. Since his legs were crossed and only his left foot was resting on the bed, the five Narutos would need to improvise. Two of the fox boys were ordered to rub the left foot; one massaging Kibaâs heel while the other stood on his shoulders and rubbed his hands over the middle of the foot. The remaining three leapt off the bed to reach Kibaâs right foot. One Naruto stood on the large toes of the left foot so he could rub the side of the right. Meanwhile; the last two (one of which was the real Naruto) were forced to cling to Kibaâs right foot; they hugged its sweaty bulk with both arms while simultaneously rubbing it.

âHahaha, wow! That feels amazing!â Kiba exclaimed as he lay back completely on the bed; arms rested behind his messy brown hair. âYour clones are perfect for this job, Naruto! Itâs like having a limitless amount of tiny slaves!â The dog ninja chuckled to himself as he considered the possibilities.

âGrrrâ¦stupid mutt!â mumbled one of the clones rubbing Kibaâs left foot. âWeâre shadow clones, not foot rubbers! We were made to kick ass, notâ¦THIS!â

âHey, lower your voice!â replied the clone whose shoulders the first was standing on. The blond teen looked up at his lookalike as he dug his fingers into the hard heel of Kibaâs sole. âI donât like it either, but do you wanna get crushed under them instead?! We may just be clones, but is that really the way you want to go?â

ââ¦damnitâ¦â the clone grumbled his response as he silently resumed his rubbing. All five of the Narutos coughed as they were forced to inhale the hellish stench. In minutes Narutoâs face, along with those of his clones, were drenched in sweat. It was mostly their own, but the same couldnât be said for the sweat that soaked their hair and clothes. While they suffered, Kiba was clearly enjoying himself. Chuckles, moans, and odd combinations of the two left his lips as he occasionally wiggled and flexed his toes with content. This greatly annoyed the Naruto that stood on them, but his shouts were ignored by the larger shinobi. The minutes continued to pass until an entire half hour went by; half an hour of nonstop exposure to Kibaâs stinky, damp feet. By this time the five blond genin had gone pale from the odor and their hands were getting tired. As the real Naruto felt himself slowly start sliding down the side of Kibaâs right foot, he wondered how much longer he would have to endure this.

As if on cue, a loud rumbling sound broke the silence and snapped all five of the clones out of their stench-filled trances. Kiba had heard the sound too and touched its origin: his stomach. The brown haired chūnin sat up and looked down at his clothed abdomen.

âOops, you five were doing such a good job that you made me forget how hungry I was! Guess Iâll go get a bite to eat; you guys stay here and donât move!â Naruto and his clones quickly retreated off Kibaâs feet as he started to move. At leastâ¦three of them did. One of the clones, the one standing on Kibaâs toes, was not fast enough. Kiba also seemed to have forgotten about him as he swung his legs off the bed.

âH-Hey! Wait for me to get off!â the clone cried as he slipped off the moving giantâs toes and instinctively wrapped his arms around Kibaâs big toe so he hung from it. This would prove to be his undoing as it put him directly underneath the ball of Kibaâs foot! The shadow clone realized his mistake too late as he looked down at saw the wooden floor rapidly approaching. âNooooo-!!â

Kiba jumped off his bed and landed on the floor of his bedroom. There was a quick crunch under his left foot followed by a âpoofâ. Surprised, Kiba raised the bare foot, but only saw the last bit of smoke the clone released upon his disappearance.

âOh, did I accidently crush one of them? My bad!â Kiba grinned darkly and without even giving Naruto a look of apology left for the kitchen. Back on the bed, the real blond jinchūriki fell onto his butt and shook with fear. The moment the shadow clone had been dispelled, its memories and experiences had flooded into his mind. He was perfectly okay, but he now knew what it was like to be brutally crushed underneath Kibaâs foot.

âO-Oh manâ¦if that had been meâ¦Iâd of been a goner!â Naruto exclaimed as he gulped.

A few minutes later Kiba returned carrying a plate of what appeared to be leftover pizza. One slice was already in his mouth and had been completely devoured by the time Kiba sat cross legged on his bed. As he noisily consumed another slice, the four tiny Narutos stared up at him and the pizza with wide blue eyes. Drool dripped from the corner of their mouths and Kiba only noticed them after polishing off another slice.

âWhat are you looking at?â Kiba asked, raising an eyebrow.

âH-Hey, Kiba! Give me some of that!â the real Naruto shouted loudly and without hesitation.

âWhat?!â responded Kiba as he gave Naruto a look as if he had just asked to have Akamaru.

âCome on! Iâm in the same boat as you; I havenât eaten anything since yesterday thanks to that mission! Just give me a little, okay? Itâs not like I can eat much at this sizeâ¦â

The larger male stared down at the Narutos and then to his plate of pizza. A hungry Naruto meant a less useful Naruto and it was true he wouldnât need much; a single peperoni would probably fill the dope up. A few seconds past before Kiba sighed and lifted one of the pizza slices off the plate.

âAlright, you can have a littleâ¦â Kiba spoke as he dangled the pizza above the four Narutosâ heads. Their eyes turned to sparkles as they all leapt for the delicious pizza. Unfortunately for them, Kiba wasnât planning on suddenly becoming too nice. Right before they reached the pizza Kiba yanked it out of their reach; the four Narutos screaming as they fell on top of one another.

âWhat the hell, Kiba?!â one of the Narutos yelled in anger as the group got back to their feet.

âHehe, you didnât think it would be that easy, did you? If you want to eat youâre gonna have to work for it!

âB-But we just worked our asses off massaging your feet!â one of the clones retorted, earning an evil snicker from the teenage giant.

âYeah, and you did a great job. However, that was just for my own amusement! If you want to eat, youâre going to have toâ¦â
